description: A Manx lawyer claims new inmates were denied access to showers and exercise at the island's jail.
title: Isle of Man minister says inmates were detained 24 hours a day
title_page: Isle of Man minister says inmates were detained 24 hours a day - BBC News
maintext: Phil Matthews, of Amnesty International Isle of Man, said that while the coronavirus pandemic had created "exceptional circumstances" at the prison, the situation "must not give the green light to trample on our basic human rights and liberties".
